member.name: HistogramBlobHeader
member.summary: The HistogramBlobHeader structure describes the blob size and the number of histograms in the blob for the MF_CAPTURE_METADATA_HISTOGRAM attribute.

member.name: HistogramBlobHeader.Size
member.summary: Size of the entire histogram blob in bytes.

member.name: HistogramBlobHeader.Histograms
member.summary: Number of histograms in the blob. Each histogram is identified by a .
